title: Image Generation â€” OpenAI
author: Jarvis Inc
curl_example: curl -X POST https://api.openai.com/v1/images/generations -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer $OPENAI_API_KEY" -d '{"model": "dall-e-3", "prompt": "A pixel art office with retro computers", "n": 1, "size": "1024x1024"}'

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate images from a text prompt using DALL-E 3

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Detailed text description of the image to generate

returns.description: Generated image with base64 data URI, revised prompt, and metadata

commands.name: edit
commands.description: Edit an existing image based on a text prompt (requires DALL-E 2)

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: URL of the source image to edit (must be square PNG, max 4MB)

returns.description: Edited image object with url and metadata

commands.name: variation
commands.description: Create variations of an existing image (requires DALL-E 2)

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: URL of the source image (must be square PNG, max 4MB)

returns.description: Array of variation image objects with urls
